https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2uaFS4bkWqX4jaAP8IXH46p8K3A.jpg Blonde, bouncy Buffy is your typical high school cheerleader. But all that changes when a strange man informs her she's been chosen by fate to kill vampires. Buffy the Vampire Slayer
